english.segment1: What ya sayin', don't look at me. You got a problem, totally. My hearts pumpin' adrenaline. You wanna fight. You're gonna die
english.segment2: I'm not like that at all
english.segment3: Hey struggle a bad fear. You'll see tomorrow I'll be near. And my pistol is firin'. You wanna go, I said no
english.segment4: Don't even think you got me wired. You'll never know just what I mean. I am the poet and the liar. Not at all like what you think. I am the saved my beloved. Take control of every fall. I am not like that at all
